src:
Mobil Masuk Parit di Tol BSD, Polisi: Pengemudi Ngantuk
03 Nov 2019, 00:28 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Sebuah mobil terperosok ke dalam parit yang berada di pinggir ruas Tol BSD, tepatnya di KM 10, menjelang exit Tol Pamulang. Tidak ada korban dalam kecelakaan tersebut.
Kecelakaan tunggal ini terjadi di Tol BSD KM 10, Minggu (2/10/2019) pukul 22.45 WIB. Polisi baru saja melakukan evakuasi kendaraan yang mengalami kecelakaan.
"Baru saja selesai evakuasi," kata Kepala Induk Tol BSD Korlantas Polri, AKP Wahyudianto, ketika dikonfirmasi detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Wahyudianto mengatakan penyebab kecelakaan adalah pengemudi yang mengantuk, sehingga sempat tak sadar sedang berkendara.
"Keterangan pengemudi ngantuk," ujar Wahyudianto.
text:
Car Enters Trench in BSD Toll, Police: Sleepy Driver
Nov 3 2019, 00:28 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - A car fell into a ditch on the edge of the BSD Toll Road section, precisely in KM 10, ahead of the Pamulang Toll exit. There were no victims in the accident.
This single accident occurred at KM 10 Toll Road on Sunday (10/10/2019) at 22:45 WIB. The police just evacuated the vehicle that was in an accident.
"Just finished the evacuation," said the Head of the Toll Road of the Indonesian National Police Traffic Corps, AKP Wahyudianto, when confirmed detikcom, Saturday (11/2/2019).
Wahyudianto said the cause of the accident was the driver who was sleepy, so he was unaware that he was driving.
"The driver's description is sleepy," Wahyudianto said.
